name: Nightshift at the Christmas Factory
description:
PLAY THE GAME IN FULL SCREEN WITH THE BLUE SCALING BUTTON!

In this drag and drop crafter minigame, you are one of Santa's workers, who have to rush the work, because Christmas is nearly here!

Controll the game cursor with mouse, left click to drag a part, release to let it go, pull 2 parts together to create a toy.

You can see your tasks in upper left corner, and you can put the done toys to the bag in the left bottom corner. Thats all. Have fun!
